name: Access Compliance Dashboard - Back Office User
description: As a Back Office User, I need to access the Compliance Dashboard module to view and manage compliance information for all companies

background.text: I am on the application home page
I am logged in as a Back Office User

scenarios.name: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I should see the companies list view

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct title

steps.text: I am on the home page
I look at the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see the title displayed as "Compliance Dashboard"

scenarios.name: Companies list view displays all company records

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I view the companies list
I should see records of all companies
each record should display the company name
each record should have a View Details action button

scenarios.name: View Details action navigates to company-specific compliance details

steps.text: I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
I click the "View Details" button for a specific company
I should be directed to the Compliance Dashboard for that company
I should see compliance details related to that company only

scenarios.name: Company Name column displays correct data from compliance records

steps.text: I am viewing the companies list
I examine the Company Name column
each entry should display the client company name from compliance records
the company names should be properly formatted

scenarios.name: Action column displays View Details button for each company

steps.text: I am on the companies list view
I look at the Action column
each row should display "View Details" as the action
all View Details buttons should be clickable

scenarios.name: Non-Back Office User cannot see Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am logged in as a user without Back Office role
I view the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should not have access to compliance information

scenarios.name: Direct URL access to Compliance Dashboard without proper role

steps.text: I am logged in as a user without Back Office role
I attempt to access the Compliance Dashboard URL directly
I should see an access denied message
I should be redirected to an appropriate page

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard handles empty companies list

steps.text: there are no companies in the system
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
I should see an appropriate empty state message
the list view should display properly without errors

scenarios.name: View Details button handles companies with missing compliance data

steps.text: I am viewing a company with incomplete compliance data
I click the "View Details" button for that company
I should still be directed to the company-specific dashboard
I should see an appropriate message about missing data

scenarios.name: Companies list displays correctly with maximum number of companies

steps.text: the system contains the maximum allowed number of companies
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
the companies list should load completely
all company records should be displayed correctly
the page should remain responsive

scenarios.name: Companies list handles single company record

steps.text: there is only one company in the system
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
I should see exactly one company record
the list view should display properly with single entry
the View Details button should work correctly

scenarios.name: Alternative access through main navigation menu

steps.text: I am logged in as a Back Office User
I access the Compliance Dashboard through the main navigation menu
I should reach the same companies list view
all functionality should work identically

gherkin_content:
Feature: Access Compliance Dashboard - Back Office User
  As a Back Office User, I need to access the Compliance Dashboard module to view and manage compliance information for all companies

  Background:
    Given I am on the application home page
    And I am logged in as a Back Office User

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    And I should see the companies list view

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct title
    Given I am on the home page
    When I look at the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see the title displayed as "Compliance Dashboard"

  @positive @data
  Scenario: Companies list view displays all company records
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When I view the companies list
    Then I should see records of all companies
    And each record should display the company name
    And each record should have a View Details action button

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: View Details action navigates to company-specific compliance details
    Given I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    When I click the "View Details" button for a specific company
    Then I should be directed to the Compliance Dashboard for that company
    And I should see compliance details related to that company only

  @positive @data-integrity
  Scenario: Company Name column displays correct data from compliance records
    Given I am viewing the companies list
    When I examine the Company Name column
    Then each entry should display the client company name from compliance records
    And the company names should be properly formatted

  @positive @ui-elements
  Scenario: Action column displays View Details button for each company
    Given I am on the companies list view
    When I look at the Action column
    Then each row should display "View Details" as the action
    And all View Details buttons should be clickable

  @negative @access-control
  Scenario: Non-Back Office User cannot see Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am logged in as a user without Back Office role
    When I view the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should not have access to compliance information

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Direct URL access to Compliance Dashboard without proper role
    Given I am logged in as a user without Back Office role
    When I attempt to access the Compliance Dashboard URL directly
    Then I should see an access denied message
    And I should be redirected to an appropriate page

  @negative @empty-state
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard handles empty companies list
    Given there are no companies in the system
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
    Then I should see an appropriate empty state message
    And the list view should display properly without errors

  @negative @data-handling
  Scenario: View Details button handles companies with missing compliance data
    Given I am viewing a company with incomplete compliance data
    When I click the "View Details" button for that company
    Then I should still be directed to the company-specific dashboard
    And I should see an appropriate message about missing data

  @edge-case @performance
  Scenario: Companies list displays correctly with maximum number of companies
    Given the system contains the maximum allowed number of companies
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
    Then the companies list should load completely
    And all company records should be displayed correctly
    But the page should remain responsive

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Companies list handles single company record
    Given there is only one company in the system
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard
    Then I should see exactly one company record
    And the list view should display properly with single entry
    And the View Details button should work correctly

  @alternative-flow
  Scenario: Alternative access through main navigation menu
    Given I am logged in as a Back Office User
    When I access the Compliance Dashboard through the main navigation menu
    Then I should reach the same companies list view
    And all functionality should work identically
